description:
Let`s all go to the hot spring! A little rest and relaxation might be possible…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cleanse My Wings / I`ll Lay Myself Bare / My Favorite Time
Waga Tsubasa o Jouka Seyo! / Watashi ga Hitohada Nugu yo / Watashi no Suki na Jikan
我が翼を浄化せよ! / 私がひと肌脱ぐよ / 私の好きな時間
